name: Mimi Mochi
description:
Squelch, dash and bounce your way to freedom as you help Mimi Mochi escape from Dokoka in this almost authentic NES style semi platformer. Play by yourself or bring a friend for local split screen multiplayer.

  • 4 channel 8 bit sounds and music generated with deflemask NES mode 
  • *Almost* NES accurate graphics, using PAL region NES palette
  • Keyboard and controller support - let me know if your controller is not supported
  • Split screen multiplayer (though you don’t really interact)
  • Around 30 stages to bounce through
  • Occasionally get stuck in walls or warp through floors because bugs!
